page.title: 15Industry near Holbeach Bank
page.content: Mr. Buxton is a self employed machine worker. He makes spare parts for machinery. If a machine needs repairing, he copies the original. He works on lathes and special equipment. He has been working in a disused chapel for over ten years. He works on his own .He has all sorts of machinery in his workshop which was built in 1864. Tinsley's is where most mums and dads work. They grow vegetables and clean, prepare and pack them to be sold in big chain stores. The onion factory in Moulton Seas End is on the outskirts of the village. It sometimes smells of onions when you go near it.There is a machine with holes and the onions go through the holes of their size and get washed in a large bucket and packed in vacuum packs to be sent to shops.
